description: Example images for Nano Banana model showcase

parameters.prompt:
A realistic cinematic portrait of a young woman standing alone on a city rooftop at dawn.
She has shoulder-length dark brown hair moving slightly in the wind, natural skin texture, no heavy makeup.
She wears a dark green bomber jacket, gray t-shirt, black jeans, and worn sneakers.
The early morning sky is pale blue with soft orange light near the horizon.
Urban buildings stretch into the distance.
Natural lighting, cinematic color grading, shallow depth of field, 35mm film look, high realism, detailed facial features.

A close-up selfie of three cat with different expressions in front of the iconic Eiffel Tower, taken at golden hour with cinematic lighting. The animals are positioned close to the camera with their heads touching, mimicking a selfie pose, showing joyful, surprised, and calm expressions. The background features the full architectural detail of [landmark], softly illuminated, with a warm ambient atmosphere. Shot in a photographic, realistic cartoon style, high detail.

Create a hyper-realistic macro photograph depicting a bustling futuristic city miniaturized
within a single dewdrop for the Micro art.A microscopic metropolis teems with impossible life,
its intricate structures shimmering inside the dewdrop.Luminescent pathways weave between
crystalline buildings,reflecting light and hinting at atomic-scale activity.Details to
include:Skyscraper-like structures of solidified light;pollen-sized airships on transparent
sky-bridges;intricate architectural details;a faint,vibrant energy grid;and a crystalline
texture on the dewdrop's surface.The dewdrop rests on a gossamer spider's web strand,stretched
between blurred emerald leaves.Invisible silk threads catch ambient light,framing the
spherical city.Out-of-focus foliage creates bokeh,emphasizing the minuscule world in a
fantastical natural setting.Ethereal,highly refractive early morning sunlight passes through
the dewdrop,creating dazzling prisms and concentrated beams illuminating the city with wonder
and discovery.A soft,golden glow suggests warmth.Iridescent blues,greens,purples for city
structures,contrasted with warm golden and amber hues from refracted sunlight,plus deep greens
of blurred leaves.Hints of silver and white.Breathtaking sense of delicate wonder and
impossible scale.Hyper-realistic macro photography,intricate detail,refractive light,surreal
fantasy,impossible perspective,dreamlike,cinematic,ultra HD.Overlay text '@AnividAI'at the bottom.
